welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Beverwijk, a charming and historic city known for its bustling market and beautiful architecture. We invite you to immerse yourself in its rich culture and explore all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for Schiphol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for some European and intercontinental flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal primarily used for intercontinental flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: A newer terminal used for some European and intercontinental flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
